product.des:
Application is Specially Designed & Developed for International Education Company .

There are Following  Features Of This Application.

  1. Multi-page layout.
  2. SEO Friendly.
  3. Responsive Design.
  4. Separate Admin Panel.
  5. Universities.
  6. Locations.
  7. Accommodations.
  8. Courses.
  9. Multi Roles Student & Agents.
  10. Register Form.
  11. Online Payments
  12. News.
  13. Blogs.
  14. Testimonials
  15. Contact Form.
  16. Blog.
  17. Complete Site Customization.
